entry.data:
CLEAR
PATCHY FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
CALM WINDS

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CALM WINDS

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
